events.title: Jennifer Tucker on Outlaw Capital: Everyday Illegalities and the Making of Uneven Development | City & Regional Planning Lecture
events.description: A lecture by Jennifer Tucker focusing on outlaw capital, everyday illegalities, and their role in uneven development.

events.title: Analytics for Retail Supply Chains (Amitabh Sinha, Amazon)
events.description: A seminar on analytics applied to retail supply chains, featuring insights from Amitabh Sinha of Amazon.

events.title: Discussion | El Salvador - The Past is Prologue
events.description: A discussion event exploring the history and current context of El Salvador.

events.title: Laurie Olin + Walter Hood in Conversation | Public Land, Public Space, Public Discourse
events.description: A conversation between renowned landscape architects Laurie Olin and Walter Hood on public land, space, and discourse.

events.title: The Jewish Community of Vienna in the Middle Ages: A Turbulent History and Its Material Remains
events.description: A lecture detailing the turbulent history and material remains of the Jewish community in medieval Vienna.

events.title: State and Local Reforms to Development Impact Fees: Practical Steps Toward Transparency and Equity
events.description: A session discussing reforms to development impact fees at state and local levels, focusing on transparency and equity.

events.title: The rise of the strongman presidency
events.description: A lecture examining the phenomenon of the rise of strongman presidencies in global politics.

events.title: CAS 2026 Annual Lecture - Africa's Ill-fitting Imperial Clothes
events.description: The annual lecture from the Center for African Studies (CAS) exploring themes of imperialism and modern Africa.

events.title: Unmentionables: Textiles, Garment Work, and the Syrian American Working Class
events.description: A presentation on the social and economic history of textiles, garment work, and the Syrian American working class.

events.title: Environmental and Energy Economics Seminar – Diego Kanzig, Northwestern University
events.organizer: UC Berkeley Haas School of Business
events.description: An environmental and energy economics seminar featuring a speaker from Northwestern University.

events.title: Making Sense of the World through Language and Stories: A Digital Humanities Perspective (Michaela Mahlberg)
events.description: Michaela Mahlberg discusses understanding the world through language and stories from a digital humanities perspective.

events.title: Berkeley Book Chat with Julia Fawcett
events.description: A book chat session with author Julia Fawcett, open to the Berkeley community.

events.title: Beyond Policing: How Streetcorner Mediators Keep the Peace Without State Violence
events.description: A discussion on alternative methods of maintaining peace through streetcorner mediators, independent of state violence.

events.title: Social belonging in Mycenaean chamber tombs: an interdisciplinary multiproxy analysis
events.description: An interdisciplinary analysis of social belonging as evidenced in Mycenaean chamber tombs.

events.title: Discussion with Michaela Mahlberg
events.description: An in-person, collaborative deep dive with Bellwether Lecturer Michaela Mahlberg.

events.title: Teenage Wasteland (Film Screening)
events.description: A screening of 'Teenage Wasteland', a film about high school students exposing toxic waste dumping. Followed by a conversation with the filmmakers.

events.title: Black Life: Memory as Miracle
events.description: A performance exploring the power of memory in Black life, presented by two performance artists.

events.title: Robert Beavers: Program 7 (Film Screening)
events.description: A screening of Robert Beavers's later works, demonstrating his continued interest in poetic form and emotions related to home.

events.title: Light Catcher Workshop
events.description: A workshop to create magical glass dream catchers, inspired by MATRIX exhibition artist Andro Eradze's surreal world.

events.title: Exhibition Tour: Theresa Hak Kyung Cha: Multiple Offerings
events.description: A guided tour of the 'Theresa Hak Kyung Cha: Multiple Offerings' exhibition, led by graduate students.

events.title: Gösta Berling’s Saga (Parts 1 & 2) (Film Screening)
events.description: A screening of the classic silent film 'Gösta Berling’s Saga', presented in two parts.

events.title: Classical Concert in the Florilegium with Left Coast Chamber Ensemble
events.location: Julia Morgan Hall, UC Botanical Garden
events.description: Enjoy a special noon concert featuring musicians from the Left Coast Chamber Ensemble in the beautiful Florilegium.

events.title: Steven Banks and Xak Bjerken: Golden Silhouettes
events.description: Cal Performances debut of saxophonist Steven Banks and pianist Xak Bjerken in a program of diverse musical works.

events.title: The Loft Hour: Chris Batterman Cháirez + Cathy Lu
events.description: An informal conversation with arts faculty Chris Batterman Cháirez (Music) and Cathy Lu (Art Practice) moderated by an ARC-affiliated faculty member.

events.title: Martha Graham Dance Company: GRAHAM100: A Celebration
events.description: A celebration of the Martha Graham Dance Company's 100th anniversary, featuring classic and new modern dances.

events.title: Martha Graham Dance Company: GRAHAM100: A Celebration (Matinee)
events.description: A matinee performance celebrating the Martha Graham Dance Company's 100th anniversary, showcasing modern dance.

events.title: Spring Workshop: Adaptation
events.organizer: UC Berkeley Theater, Dance, and Performance Studies
events.description: A workshop showcasing 'Adaptation,' a satiric comedy that portrays everyday life with anarchic madness and banal familiarity.

events.title: Plein AiR Patrol with Forest Stearns
events.description: Discover outdoor painting in the Garden with artist Forest Stearns of DRAWEVERYWHERE Studios in this interactive Artist in Residency project.

events.title: Letterpress Workshop: Printing Image & Text
events.description: A workshop in partnership with The CODEX Foundation for Berkeley students to learn letterpress printing of image and text.

events.title: Cal Men's Basketball vs Clemson
events.description: Watch the Cal Golden Bears men's basketball team take on Clemson in a home game at Haas Pavilion.

events.title: Cal Women's Basketball vs Virginia
events.description: The Cal Golden Bears women's basketball team hosts Virginia at Haas Pavilion.

events.title: Cal Baseball vs. Santa Clara
events.location: Evans Diamond at Stu Gordon Stadium, Berkeley, CA
events.description: The Cal Golden Bears baseball team plays a home game against Santa Clara.

events.title: Cal Baseball vs. Santa Clara
events.location: Evans Diamond at Stu Gordon Stadium, Berkeley, CA
events.description: Catch the Cal Golden Bears baseball team in another home game against Santa Clara.

events.title: Cal Women's Basketball vs Virginia Tech
events.description: The Cal Golden Bears women's basketball team faces Virginia Tech in a home game.

events.title: Cal Women's Gymnastics vs. UNC
events.description: Cal Women's Gymnastics team competes against UNC at a home event.

events.title: Cal Rugby vs BYU
events.description: The Cal Rugby team takes on BYU in a home match.

events.title: Cal Men's Basketball vs Stanford
events.description: The Cal Golden Bears men's basketball team plays rival Stanford at Haas Pavilion.

events.title: Weekly CrafterDark
events.description: A weekly craft and art making session for students at Anchor House.

events.title: Kaffeeklatsch
events.description: An informal social gathering for students, faculty, and staff to connect over coffee and conversation.

events.title: UndocuGrads: 25-26 Life After Berkeley Webinars
events.description: A webinar offering insights and resources for undocumented graduate students planning their lives after Berkeley.

events.title: Connecting with Graduate Student Resources and Organizations
events.description: An event to help graduate students connect with key campus resources and student organizations.

events.title: Valentine's Day Event
events.location: 1st Floor of MLK Jr. Building, Game Zone Area
events.description: Celebrate Valentine's Day with friends, featuring free treats, crafts, and more at the Student Union.

events.title: Movie Night at Headlands (She's the Man)
events.description: A fun movie night for UC Berkeley students, screening the romantic comedy 'She's the Man'.

events.title: 2026 Cal Invitational Speech and Debate Tournament
events.description: The annual Cal Invitational Speech and Debate Tournament, featuring a mix of in-person and online events for students.

events.title: Lunar New Year Event
events.description: Celebrate the Lunar New Year with free treats and activities at the Student Union.

events.title: Blind Box Charms Crafting
events.description: A crafting event to make blind box charms, hosted in partnership with Cub Concerts.

events.title: Black History Month Celebration
events.description: Honor Black History Month with free treats and exploration of local Black-owned businesses on campus.

events.title: Drag Bingo
events.description: An unforgettable night of laughter, prizes, and treats hosted by Thee Leggy Pee.

events.title: EM&V Forum
events.description: A forum addressing critical issues related to Evaluation, Measurement, and Verification (EM&V) in the energy sector.

events.title: Introducing the Agentic AI Risk Management Profile
events.organizer: UC Berkeley School of Information, CLTC
events.description: A presentation on managing risks associated with agentic AI systems.

events.title: Highly Adaptive Principal Component Regression: Fast HAL/HAR via Outcome-Blind Kernel PCA (Michael Wang)
events.organizer: Center for Targeted Machine Learning and Causal Inference (CTML)
events.description: A seminar on advanced statistical methods for principal component regression and machine learning.

events.title: Language & AI Conference
events.description: A conference exploring the intersection of language, literature, culture study, and artificial intelligence across UC campuses.

events.title: Traffic Safety Innovation Summit
events.description: A premier summit focusing on innovations in traffic safety, hosted at a UC Berkeley facility.

events.title: Workshop by Alejandro Schuler
events.organizer: Center for Targeted Machine Learning and Causal Inference (CTML)
events.description: A workshop led by Alejandro Schuler, details forthcoming, as part of the CTML seminar series.

events.title: Andrew Mertens Seminar
events.organizer: Center for Targeted Machine Learning and Causal Inference (CTML)
events.description: A seminar presentation by Andrew Mertens on a topic in targeted machine learning and causal inference.

events.title: CITRIS Day 2026: Engineering a Future Fit for Humanity
events.location: Banatao Auditorium, Sutardja Dai Hall, UC Berkeley
events.description: An annual showcase of emerging research, applications, and societal impact of CITRIS, focusing on technology for public good.

events.title: ACM Symposium on Computer Science and Law
events.description: A premier conference dedicated to the interdisciplinary field merging computing technology with legal scholarship.

events.title: Alissa Gordon Seminar
events.organizer: Center for Targeted Machine Learning and Causal Inference (CTML)
events.description: A seminar presentation by Alissa Gordon on a topic in targeted machine learning and causal inference.

events.title: Robotics & AI Conference
events.organizer: UC Berkeley Haas Institute for Business Innovation
events.location: Spieker Forum, Haas School of Business
events.description: A conference focusing on advancements and applications in robotics and artificial intelligence.

events.title: Conversation with author Halle Tecco
events.organizer: UC Berkeley School of Public Health
events.location: UC Berkeley School of Public Health, 2121 Berkeley Way, Berkeley, CA
events.description: A conversation and live podcast recording featuring entrepreneur, investor, and educator Halle Tecco.

events.title: Beyond Delaware: Should startups incorporate in Nevada?
events.description: A discussion on corporate governance for startups, exploring alternatives to incorporating in Delaware.

events.title: Transpacific Collaboration Forum: Japan's Partnering Strategy to Revitalize Its Semiconductor Industry
events.organizer: UC Berkeley Haas Institute for Business Innovation
events.description: A forum discussing Japan's strategy for revitalizing its semiconductor industry through transpacific collaboration.

events.title: Deep Tech Innovation Lab Matchmaking Event
events.organizer: UC Berkeley Haas Institute for Business Innovation
events.description: An event to connect innovators and teams for deep tech projects and ventures.

events.title: Rural Health Hackathon
events.organizer: UC Berkeley School of Public Health
events.description: A hackathon to build innovative health solutions for rural communities, in response to new federal programs.

events.title: Berkeley-Stanford StarX Pitch Day
events.organizer: UC Berkeley Haas Institute for Business Innovation
events.description: A pitch day showcasing promising startups from Berkeley and Stanford, organized by the Haas Institute for Business Innovation.

events.title: POWER Conference on Energy Research and Policy
events.organizer: UC Berkeley Haas School of Business
events.location: Spieker Forum, Haas School of Business
events.description: A conference convening leaders to examine energy research and policy, often with entrepreneurial implications.

events.title: UC LAUNCH Spring 2026 Launchathon
events.description: A two-day hackathon weekend event for students to help UC LAUNCH Startups build their ideas, filled with workshops and networking.

events.title: Deep Tech Innovation Lab Demo Day
events.organizer: UC Berkeley Haas Institute for Business Innovation
events.description: A demo day showcasing new deep tech innovations developed through the Haas Institute for Business Innovation.

events.title: UC LAUNCH Spring 2026 Demo Day
events.description: An event to see the next wave of entrepreneurs shaping the future, as startup finalists pitch for prizes.

events.title: FCBA Aerospace Event
events.organizer: UC Berkeley Haas Institute for Business Innovation
events.description: An event focused on the aerospace sector, likely involving business, innovation, and entrepreneurship.
